ConnectionString.description: Gets or sets the connection string of the MySQL database to connect to.

DbContextPooling.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the DbContext will be pooled or explicitly created every time it's requested.

HealthChecks.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the database health check is enabled or not.

MaxRetryCount.description: Gets or sets the maximum number of retry attempts.

Metrics.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the OpenTelemetry metrics are enabled or not.

ServerVersion.description: Gets or sets the server version of the MySQL database to connect to.

Tracing.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the OpenTelemetry tracing is enabled or not.

MySql.description: Provides the client configuration settings for connecting to a MySQL database using EntityFrameworkCore.
